law.text:
On or before November 1 of each year, after considering the current estimate of the Committee, the Governor shall determine:
the total authorizations of new State debt that the Governor considers advisable for the next fiscal year; and
the preliminary allocation of new State debt for:
general construction projects;
school construction projects; and
other special projects.
